hydra

Interface Rewriting


  • public interface Rewriting
    Utility functions for rewriting terms, types, and other recursive data structures.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static <X,Y> java.util.function.Function<X,Y> rewrite(java.util.function.Function<java.util.function.Function<X,Y>,java.util.function.Function<X,Y>> fsub, java.util.function.Function<java.util.function.Function<X,Y>,java.util.function.Function<X,Y>> f)
      A generic rewriting function, suitable for many recursive data structures.
      static <A,B,S> Flow<S,Elimination<B>> rewriteEliminationM(java.util.function.Function<Term<A>,Flow<S,Term<B>>> recurse, Elimination<A> original)
      Rewrite an elimination expression using a monadic function.
      static <A,B,S> Flow<S,Field<B>> rewriteFieldM(java.util.function.Function<Term<A>,Flow<S,Term<B>>> recurse, Field<A> original)
      Rewrite a field using a monadic function.
      static <A,B,S> Flow<S,Function<B>> rewriteFunctionM(java.util.function.Function<Term<A>,Flow<S,Term<B>>> recurse, Function<A> original)
      Rewrite a function expression using a monadic function.
      static <A,B> Term<B> rewriteTerm(java.util.function.Function<java.util.function.Function<Term<A>,Term<B>>,java.util.function.Function<Term<A>,Term<B>>> f, java.util.function.Function<A,B> mf, Term<A> original)
      This is a workaround for a non-monadic rewriting function; the latter would be more efficient.
      static <A,B,S> Flow<S,Term<B>> rewriteTermM(java.util.function.Function<java.util.function.Function<Term<A>,Flow<S,Term<B>>>,java.util.function.Function<Term<A>,Flow<S,Term<B>>>> f, java.util.function.Function<A,Flow<S,B>> mf, Term<A> original)
      Rewrite a term using a monadic function.
